name: Mean Poems
description: Gift yourself, a freind, or a frenemy. This limited edition volume of cathartic Wright poems will armor anyone who's suffered injustice. Designed by d-Labs, printed on Ingres paper in NYC.

name: Holiday Specials
description: Support artists and writers this season with a subscription to LiVE MAG! Pre-order Issue 19 and receive a unique holiday card plus a birthday gift book with your $25. subscription! Order 2 ($50) to receive a limited edition, signed and numbered copy of THE MEAN POEMS with handmade cover.

name: By and By
description: Celebrate year-round with this 2021 chapbook of 12 birthday poems dedicated to colleague poets and artists. By Jeffrey Cyphers Wright.
